source:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
To rule the skies is not enough; the Ehcatl Nine would do so in style.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 16 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 49 and above.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
※本クエストは、クラフタークラス：レベル16以上、
　バトルクラス：レベル49以上推奨です。

エカトル実験場の副長のジェズル・アファタンは、最高にワルでセクシーな依頼があるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_01As the Dezul Qualan nears completion, Jezul Ahuatan finds himself more concerned about the image the Ehcatl Nine will project with their new airship. To simply soar above their earthbound brethren is not enough; they must do so in an airship both powerful and aesthetically pleasing. To this end, Jezul Ahuatan would have you meet with a brother of Ehcatl in Natalan, who has infiltrated enemy ranks and stolen the materials needed to craft high-quality decorative plating components. Venture within the Ixali stronghold and, with the chat mode in Say, enter the password “Amid the Flowers” to identify yourself as a friend.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_01※本クエストには「 レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

副長のジェズル・アファタンから「」の製作を依頼された。製作に必要な材料を受け取るには、ナタラン入植地にいる「空力団の隠密」に、合言葉を言う必要があるそうだ。チャットの会話モードを「Say」モードにして、キーボードやソフトウェアキーボードで『果てぬ夢を！』と入力し、空力団の隠密から「」を受け取ろう。

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_02<tab>The Ehcatl infiltrator responds to your cryptic phrase with an equally cryptic reply of his own, before furnishing you with the decorative plating component materials you seek. Present them to Norbettaux at Camp Dragonhead in order to gain access to the crafting facility under his care.
target: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_02<tab>空力団の隠密から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A1801 /var>を入手し、次の指示を受けた。キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドの「ノルベットー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A1801 /var>」を渡し、製作施設の使用許可をもらおう。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_03Norbettaux has prepared the crafting facility for your use. With the materials you have obtained, synthesize two decorative plating components, and deliver them to Jezul Ahuatan at Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Finishing II wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Norbettaux.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_03製作施設の準備が整った。「」をもとに「」を2つ製作し、エカトル実験場の「副長のジェズル・アファタン」に納品しよう。

※バフステータス「製作施設：精密工作II」が終了した場合や、「」を失った場合は、再びノルベットーに話しかけましょう。バフステータスと材料が付与され、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_04<tab>Never let it be said that the Ehcatl Nine are lacking in passion, for upon receiving your components, Jezul Ahuatan is driven into a frenzy of Ixali pride. The Second echoes the words of his chieftain, declaring that his brethren shall soon fulfill the destiny for which they─and you─have long labored. Indeed, when the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>, that shining culmination of the Ehcatl Nine's hard work, one day takes flight, you can take pride in knowing that the obnoxious decorations which grace its hull are but one of your countless contributions.
target: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SEQ_04<tab>副長のジェズル・アファタンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8127)) 01 /var>を納品した。ジェズルは冒険者をかけがえのない仲間と認め、合言葉の由来を教えてくれた。『風のごとく　もっと高く　天を翔ける　折れぬ翼を　果てぬ夢を』……それは昔、セズル・トトロックと果てぬ夢をわかちあった、エカトル空力団の誓いの言葉だった。大空の彼方をめざす、彼らの「果てぬ夢」を、ともに見とどけよう。

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “Amid the Flowers” to let the Ehcatl Nine silencer in Natalan know you are not an enemy.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_TODO_00チャットの「Say」モードで『果てぬ夢を！』と入力し
ナタラン入植地の空力団の隠密に合言葉を言う

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_TODO_01<tab>Present the decorative plating component materials to Norbettaux at Camp Dragonhead.
target: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_TODO_01<tab>キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドのノルベットーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A1801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize decorative plating components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the decorative plating components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Jezul Ahuatan the Second)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエストLv16：<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8127)) 01 /var>を製作)) ((副長のジェズル・アファタンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8127)) 01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_000<tab>What next will Ehcatl ask for, featherless one wonders? Squee-squee... Quality decorative plating components, we seek this time. Of the utmost importance, soaring through the heavens in style is!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_000アンタかッァ！　今回は高品質の「」を2つ頼むッゥ！
こいつはッァ、いよいよ全体の総仕上げだッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_010<tab>Ornamentation for the hull of the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>, we seek, to further demonstrate our superiority to buzzards below! Sqqquawk!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_010つまりッィ、味気ねぇ船体を飾る「装飾部品」だッァ！
最っ高にワルでセクシーに仕上げるための部材ッィ！
バリバリ、イカした飛空艇に大変身ッン！　激マブだぜッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_020<tab>Paints for the hull of the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>, we seek, to further demonstrate our superiority to buzzards below! Sqqquawk!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_020つまりッィ、味気ねぇ船体を塗る「塗料」だッァ！
最っ高にワルでセクシーに仕上げるための部材ッィ！
バリバリ、イカした飛空艇に大変身ッン！　激マブだぜッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_030<tab>Ornamentation for the hull of the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>, we seek, to further demonstrate our superiority to buzzards below! Sqqquawk!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_030つまりッィ、味気ねぇ船体を飾る「装飾部品」だッァ！
最っ高にワルでセクシーに仕上げるための部材ッィ！
バリバリ、イカした飛空艇に大変身ッン！　激マブだぜッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_040<tab>Yet held by the selfsame buzzards, the materials we seek are! Requests to share, they would squawkka-wak! Accomplish nothing, diplomacy will!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_040ただッァ、このイカした「」を作るにはッァ、
特別な材料が必要なんだッァ。
こいつは「ナタラン入植地」に行かねぇと、手に入らねッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_041<tab>On subterfuge, we shall rely! Deep within their ranks, a brother of Ehcatl lurks. Secured our materials, he has, but leave Natalan, he dares not. Render infiltration moot, we will have him not!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_041実は、オレたち「エカトル空力団」の同志、
「空力団の隠密」のひとりがナタランに潜伏してるんだッァ！
そいつと接触して材料を受け取り、次の指示を聞けッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_042<tab>Behind enemy lines, you must go! Locate our brother, you shall! Yet play the part of foe, he must, unless a friend, he knows you to be. “Amid the Flowers,” to him you must say, lest to maintain fiction, slay you, he shall!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_042ただし、合言葉を言わねぇとシカトされっぞッォ！
いいか忘れるんじゃねぇぞッォ……
合言葉は「果てぬ夢を！」だッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_050<tab>With our brother in Natalan, featherless one must meet! “Amid the Flowers,” to him you must say, else a violent death, at his hands you shall meet!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_050オレたち「エカトル空力団」の同志、
「空力団の隠密」のひとりがナタランに潜伏してるんだッァ！
合言葉は「果てぬ夢を！」だッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_IXALSPY01568_000_061<tab>Featherless ones!? Within Natalan!? Die, you shall, for this trespass!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_IXALSPY01568_000_061何用かッァ？
我が同志ならば、初めに口にすべき言葉があろうッゥ？

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SYSTEM_100_061<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter the password “Amid the Flowers” to let the Ehcatl Nine silencer know you are a friend.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SYSTEM_100_061チャットの会話モードを「Say」モードにして、
キーボードやソフトウェアキーボードで
『果てぬ夢を！』と合言葉を入力しましょう。

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_IXALSPY01568_000_063<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Come share a dream<var 1A 01 /var>! Friend of my friends, for you, I have been waiting!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_IXALSPY01568_000_063その言葉……空力団の同志とお見受けしたッァ！
「」ならこのとおり、
すでに確保済みなりッィ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_IXALSPY01568_000_064<tab>Linger, you cannot. Materials, take to Camp Dragonhead for crafting. With you, I cannot be seen, else forfeit, our lives shall be.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_IXALSPY01568_000_064これを持ってキャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドに赴き、
「ノルベットー」なる者に設備を借り受けるようお頼み申すッゥ。
この界隈では、最も製作に適した地でありましょうッゥ……！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_IXALSPY01568_000_066<tab>To Camp Dragonhead, you must fly! With you, I cannot be seen, else forfeit, our lives shall be!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_IXALSPY01568_000_066キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドに赴き、
「ノルベットー」なる者に設備を借り受けるようお頼み申すッゥ。
この界隈では、最も製作に適した地でありましょうッゥ……！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_NORBETTAUX_000_070<tab>Welcome to our humble facility! You needn't say a word. You're expected, you see. You need but show me the materials to begin.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_NORBETTAUX_000_070キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドの製作施設にようこそ！
さぁさぁ、どうぞこちらへ。
かじかんだ指を温めて、製作作業、がんばりましょう！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_NORBETTAUX_000_071<tab>You must be very brave to venture so deep into Natalan─far braver than I, that much is certain! Now then, without further ado, your materials─the excess I will retain for safekeeping.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_NORBETTAUX_000_071ありがとうございます、材料袋はお預かりしますね。
……製作に必要な分量は、これくらいでしょうか？
どうぞ、ここの設備はご自由にお使いください！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_NORBETTAUX_000_100<tab>If you require aught else, you need but say the word. Additional materials, additional time with the facility─either I would be more than happy to provide.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_NORBETTAUX_000_100材料が足りなかったり、
またこの施設を使うときは、ひと声おかけください！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_NORBETTAUX_100_100<tab>A bit flamboyant for my tastes, but so long as the client is satisfied, who am I to judge? Safe travels, my friend, and remember that should disaster strike and you need to recreate your components, I will be here.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_NORBETTAUX_100_100製作はお済みのようですから、あとは納品ですね！
もしも製作した品を紛失するなどして、
こちらの施設をまた使いたいときは、ひと声おかけください！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_130<tab>None the worse for wear, you are! With our brother, you met? Our components, you have brought!?
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_130おおッォ、帰ってきたかッァ！
ナタラン入植地の様子はどうだったかッァ！？

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_131<tab>Squee-squee... Fail us, I knew you would not! The envy of all Ixal, the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var> shall be!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_131どうやら首尾よく行ったみてぇだなッァ！
そうそうッゥ！　この、最っ高にイカすぜッェ！
コイツで飾って大空に飛び立つなんざッァ、夢広がるよなッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_132<tab>With the wind, we shall fly! High as honor, we shall soar! With wings unbending, we shall roam free! To the earth, our enemies shall fall! Amid the flowers of Ayatlan, we shall live our dream!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_132夢……そう、すべてはひとつの夢から始まったんだッァ！
アンタにだけは教えてやるぜッェ！
オレたちの使ってる、合言葉の由来をなッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_133<tab>Chief Totoloc, thus spoke he! Ehcatl Nine, thus shall we be! Squaaawk!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_JEZULAHUATAN_000_133『風のごとく　もっと高く
　天を翔ける　折れぬ翼を　果てぬ夢を』……
昔、親方と交わした、オレたち空力団の誓いの言葉なのさッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_POPMESSAGE_000_200<tab>You now have access to the crafting facility.
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SYSTEM_200_200<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA607_01568_SYSTEM_200_200本クエストで製作した「NQアイテム」を所持しています。
このアイテムは、使用することはありません。
売却もできませんので、不用でしたら破棄してください。
